page.title: 15PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
Our favourite game in the Playground is BRITISH BULLDOG. To play this game one man is 'on' and has to 'tig' the others as they try to get across the playgound. When you are 'tigged' you are also 'on'.
To play SCARECROW, one man is 'on'. When you are caught you stand with your arms outstretched. To be 'Released' someone has to run under your arms. If you have been caught three times you are also 'on'.
To play RUSH you have two teams of four. One team has to run from the top 'den' to the bottom 'den'. If one person gets through the team is safe. If all are caught the teams change places.
